title: TGaceAllStories
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ‘I do all the yard work, cooking and cleaning’: I live with my daughter and her lazy boyfriend. She wants me to buy her house. Do I say yes?
items.description: “When I say anything, I am immediately wrong, unless my daughter wants something.”

items.title: Indian regulator locks U.S. trading firm out of its stock market, accusing it of ‘index manipulation’ and ‘unlawful gains’
items.description: Financial penalty and trading ban come at a difficult time in relations between U.S. and India

items.title: S&P 500 futures and dollar dip as Trump revives tariff tension
‘My whole financial world is upside down’: I’m ‘medically retired’ at 51 with $428K in stocks. Is this enough to live on?
items.description: “We don’t know where we will retire. It could be South Carolina, Georgia, Alabama, Mississippi or Texas.”

items.title: ‘I’m single’: At 70, I have $500,000 in stocks and $220,000 in savings. How do I invest my $130,000 windfall?
items.description: “I’m receiving enough Social Security to live on.”

items.title: This semiconductor stock could have more room to run after a strong first half, says UBS
items.description: Shares have gained more than 11% so far in 2025.

items.title: Re-risking your portfolio: Investor John Davi's picks for the second half of 2025
items.description: Davi advises investors to look away from popular ETFs such as SPY and VOO and instead at ETFs in industrials, energy, real estate and fixed income.

items.title: How to avoid these ‘tax torpedoes’ in retirement, per UBS
items.description: Keep a little more of your hard-earned savings by developing a retirement strategy that will help you save on taxes.
